title: Heat & Suns Look Ready for a Finals Run
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Heat outmatching the Celtics without Robert Williams. The Suns dominate the NBA in clutch time, and will Jordan Poole be the Warriors best 2nd option in the playoffs? Why the Bucs are betting on Todd Bowles to navigate Tom Brady's return to the NFL. Eric Church cancelled a concert so he could watch Duke-UNC. Soft Move or Boss Move? PLUS, Jalen breaks down exactly which games LeBron will play in down the stretch to win the NBA scoring title.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
